==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しょう|せん|きょ|く|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From [[小]] (''shō'' "small," "little") + [[選挙区]] (''senkyoku'' "electoral district," "precinct")

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しょうせんきょく}}

# [[small]] [[electoral district]], [[single-member]] [[constituency]]

====Compounds====
* [[小選挙区制]] (''shō-senkyoku sei''): single-seat constituency system
* [[小選挙区比例代表並立制]] (''shō-senkyoku hirei daihyō heiritsu sei''):electoral system comprised of single- and multiple-seat constituencies
